lead_paragraph: PAPERT--Frederic. Working for Fred Papert at 42nd Street Development Corporation, I was privileged to watch how his amazing vision and tenacity transformed a derelict block of West 42nd Street into Theatre Row. What an extraordinary teacher he was. He showed how seemingly impossible ideas can become reality. I will miss my dear friend always. My deepest condolences to his daughters, Lisha and Emily. Patricia Zedalis 1/3
